mapper.select: -- 사용자 정보 조회 SELECT MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , hashtag AS HASHTAG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{id}
-- 전체 회원 해시태그 조회 SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(HASHTAG, ' ', '') SEPARATOR ',') AS ALL_HASHTAGS FROM MEMBER WHERE HASHTAG IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(HASHTAG) != ''
-- 전체 클래스 목록과 해시태그 조회 SELECT CLASS_ID, REPLACE(HASHTAG, ' ', '') AS HASHTAGS FROM CLASS WHERE HASHTAG IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(HASHTAG) != ''

-- 추천 클래스 목록 조회 SELECT C.CLASS_ID , C.CLASS_TITLE , C.CLASS_CATEGORY , C.MEM_ID AS TEACHER_ID , M.MEM_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME , M.MEM_NICK AS TEACHER_NICK , C.CLASS_INTRO , C.CLASS_PRICE , C.CLASS_CATEGORY , C.CLASS_REG_DATE , C.CLASS_RUNTIME , C.CLASS_PIC1 AS CLASS_PIC , C.CLASS_STATUS , IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(IFNULL(AVG(REVIEW_SCORE), 0), 1) FROM REVIEW WHERE CLASS_ID = C.CLASS_ID GROUP BY CLASS_ID), 0) AS REVIEW_SCORE FROM CLASS C LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON R.CLASS_ID = C.CLASS_ID WHERE C.CLASS_ID IN (${class_ids})
